00019 #pragma once
00020 
00021 namespace cxx { namespace Bits {
00022 
00023 template< typename T >
00024 class List_iterator_end_ptr
00025 {
00026 private:
00027   template< typename U > friend class Basic_list;
00028   static void *_end;
00029 };
00030 
00031 template< typename T >
00032 void *List_iterator_end_ptr<T>::_end;
00033 
00034 template< typename VALUE_T, typename TYPE >
00035 struct Basic_list_policy
00036 {
00037   typedef VALUE_T *Value_type;
00038   typedef VALUE_T const *Const_value_type;
00039   typedef TYPE **Type;
00040   typedef TYPE *Const_type;
00041   typedef TYPE *Head_type;
00042 
00043   static Type next(Type c) { return &(*c)->_n; }
00044   static Const_type next(Const_type c) { return c->_n; }
00045 };
00046 
00047 template< typename POLICY >
00048 class Basic_list
00049 {
00050 private:
00051   Basic_list(Basic_list const &);
00052   void operator = (Basic_list const &);
00053 
00054 public:
00055   typedef typename POLICY::Value_type Value_type;
00056   typedef typename POLICY::Const_value_type Const_value_type;
00057 
00058   class End_iterator {};
00059 
00060   class Iterator
00061   {
00062   private:
00063     typedef typename POLICY::Type Internal_type;
00064 
00065   public:
00066     typedef typename POLICY::Value_type value_type;
00067     typedef typename POLICY::Value_type Value_type;
00068 
00069     Value_type operator * () const { return static_cast<Value_type>(*_c); }
00070     Value_type operator -> () const { return static_cast<Value_type>(*_c); }
00071     Iterator operator ++ () { _c = POLICY::next(_c); return *this; }
00072 
00073     bool operator == (End_iterator const &) const { return *_c == 0; }
00074     bool operator != (End_iterator const &) const { return *_c != 0; }
00075     bool operator == (Iterator const &o) const { return *_c == *o._c; }
00076     bool operator != (Iterator const &o) const { return !operator == (o); }
00077 
00078     Iterator() {}
00079     Iterator(End_iterator const &) : _c(__end()) {}
00080 
00081   private:
00082     friend class Basic_list;
00083     static Internal_type __end()
00084     {
00085       union X { Internal_type l; void **v; } z;
00086       z.v = &Bits::List_iterator_end_ptr<void>::_end;
00087       return z.l;
00088     }
00089 
00090     explicit Iterator(Internal_type i) : _c(i) {}
00091 
00092     Internal_type _c;
00093   };
00094 
00095   class Const_iterator
00096   {
00097   private:
00098     typedef typename POLICY::Const_type Internal_type;
00099 
00100   public:
00101     typedef typename POLICY::Value_type value_type;
00102     typedef typename POLICY::Value_type Value_type;
00103 
00104     Value_type operator * () const { return static_cast<Value_type>(_c); }
00105     Value_type operator -> () const { return static_cast<Value_type>(_c); }
00106     Const_iterator operator ++ () { _c = POLICY::next(_c); return *this; }
00107 
00108     bool operator == (End_iterator const &) const { return _c == 0; }
00109     bool operator != (End_iterator const &) const { return _c != 0; }
00110     bool operator == (Const_iterator const &o) const { return _c == o._c; }
00111     bool operator != (Const_iterator const &o) const { return !operator == (o); }
00112 
00113     Const_iterator() {}
00114     Const_iterator(End_iterator const &) : _c(0) {}
00115     Const_iterator(Iterator const &o) : _c(*o) {}
00116 
00117   private:
00118     friend class Basic_list;
00119 
00120     explicit Const_iterator(Internal_type i) : _c(i) {}
00121 
00122     Internal_type _c;
00123   };
00124 
00125   // BSS allocation
00126   explicit Basic_list(bool) {}
00127   Basic_list() : _f(0) {}
00128 
00129   bool empty() const { return !_f; }
00130   Value_type front() const { return static_cast<Value_type>(_f); }
00131 
00132   void clear() { _f = 0; }
00133 
00134   Iterator begin() { return Iterator(&_f); }
00135   Const_iterator begin() const { return Const_iterator(_f); }
00136   static Const_iterator iter(Const_value_type c) { return Const_iterator(c); }
00137   static End_iterator end() { return End_iterator(); }
00138 
00139 protected:
00140   static typename POLICY::Type __get_internal(Iterator const &i) { return i._c; }
00141   static Iterator __iter(typename POLICY::Type c) { return Iterator(c); }
00142 
00143   typename POLICY::Head_type _f;
00144 };
00145 
00146 }}
00147
